# Playing with the data

```{r}
plot <- 
  ccPrices %>%
  filter(Currency == "bitcoin") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Date, y = Price)) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::date_format())

ggplotly(plot)
```
